main.title: Political Realignments and Global Security Talks Shape World Headlines
main.summary: Leaders across Europe and Africa marked four years since the outbreak of the Russia-Ukraine conflict, renewing diplomatic calls for stability. In Nigeria, strategic meetings between President Bola Tinubu, state governors and labour representatives signal early positioning ahead of the 2027 elections. Meanwhile, economic analysts monitor fresh global investment shifts in the technology sector.
